markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Dhampir](/Traits.aspx?ID=750)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 316 <sup>1.1</sup>

A creature with this trait has the [dhampir](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=85) [versatile heritage](/Rules.aspx?ID=2085). These humanoids are the offspring of [vampires](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=480) and members of other ancestries.
name: Dhampir
